de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators
Class CronIterator

java.lang.Object
  de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators.CronIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScheduleIterator
public class CronIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScheduleIterator

Implementation of a schedule iterator which is based on cron entry. By means of this iterator tasks came be scheduled easily on minute, hour, day, month and week day base and all combinations of those.

Examples for cron entries:

  • "* * * * *" (every minute)
  • "0 0 1 1 *" (yearly every 1. January at 00:00)
  • "0 6,15 * * 1-5" (on 6:00 and 15:00 o'clock on weekdays) For more detailed information see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron, but consider that the sixth column, i.e. the command to execute, has to be omitted.

    Since:
    2.9.3
